ollama_generated:
7. Miscellaneous Considerations

Upon the occurrence of any event not expressly provided for herein, the parties shall endeavor in good faith to resolve such matter through amicable discussions. If a resolution cannot be reached within a reasonable timeframe, either party has the right to seek external mediation, with the cost to be borne equally by both parties unless otherwise determined by the mediator. It is expressly understood that any resolution obtained through mediation shall supersede this Agreement if agreed upon by both parties. Failure of one party to participate in good faith negotiations or mediation proceedings may result in the other party pursuing legal remedies at their sole discretion, with the non-defaulting party being indemnified for any reasonable costs and expenses associated therewith.

original: This Agreement may not be assigned without the prior written consent of the other Party hereto.
ollama_generated: This Agreement can be transferred to a third party only with the granting of prior, written consent by either Party to this Agreement, such consent not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed.

original: (f)Headings . The headings in this Agreement are for convenience of reference only and shall not limit or otherwise affect the meaning hereof.
ollama_generated: (f) Headings . For clarification purposes, the headings within this Agreement do not restrict, expand, or alter its interpretation in any way. The reader should refer to the body text for a complete understanding of the Agreement's terms and conditions.

original: Each Party and its counsel cooperated and participated in the drafting and preparation of this Agreement and the documents referred to herein, and any and all drafts relating thereto exchanged among the parties shall be deemed the work product of all of the parties and may not be construed against any Party by reason of its drafting or preparation. Accordingly, any rule of law or any legal decision that would require interpretation of any ambiguities in this Agreement against any Party that drafted or prepared it is of no application and is hereby expressly waived by each Party, and any controversy over interpretations of this Agreement shall be decided without regards to events of drafting or preparation.
ollama_generated: Each Party and its counsel actively collaborated in the formulation and compilation of this Agreement and the documents cited within, with all exchanged drafts considered jointly-produced works. As a consequence, no Party shall be held accountable for potential ambiguities within this Agreement due to their involvement in its creation, as any rule or legal interpretation that presumes such ambiguities should favor the drafter is explicitly relinquished by each Party. In resolving disputes concerning the interpretation of this Agreement, consideration will be given solely to the text itself, disregarding the sequence of drafting or preparation.

original: Exhibit 10.1 If to the Company or the Board:
ollama_generated:
Exhibit 10.1 In the Event of Communication to the Shareholder:

In the event that any matter is communicated to the Shareholder, it shall be incumbent upon the Shareholder to:

1. promptly notify the Company and/or the Board of such communication;
2. afford the Company and/or the Board a reasonable opportunity to address the matter before taking any action; and
3. cooperate with the Company and/or the Board in resolving the matter in good faith, but without obligation or assumption of responsibility for the outcome.

This clause now places an obligation on the Shareholder to communicate matters, afford a reasonable opportunity for resolution, and cooperate in good faith, while also clarifying that they are under no obligation or assumption of responsibility for the final outcome of any matter.

original: Olshan Frome Wolosky LLP 1325 Avenue of the Americas New York, NY 10019 Attention: Elizabeth Gonzalez-Sussman E-mail: egonzalez@olshanlaw.com (m)Termination . Unless earlier terminated as provided in this Agreement, upon the expiration of the Support Period in accordance with Section 4 , this Agreement shall immediately and automatically terminate in its entirety and no Party shall have any further rights or obligations under this Agreement; provided,  however , no Party shall be released from any breach of this Agreement that occurred prior to the termination of this Agreement.

Clause:

(m) Termination. This Agreement may be terminated at any time by either Party with written notice, effective immediately. However, any breaches of this Agreement prior to the termination shall survive and remain enforceable by the aggrieved Party.

In this version, I've made the clause more flexible by allowing for termination at any time with written notice, as opposed to having a specific Support Period in Section 4. Additionally, I've shifted the responsibility of enforcing prior breaches to the party that was aggrieved (i.e., the one who suffered harm from the breach), rather than stating that no Party is released from any pre-termination breaches.
